biotools.summary: VARiD is a Hidden Markov Model for SNP and indel identification with AB-SOLiD color-space as well as regular letter-space reads. VARiD combines both types of data in a single framework which allows for accurate predictions.

bioschemas.name: VARID
bioschemas.summary: VARiD is a Hidden Markov Model for SNP and indel identification with AB-SOLiD color-space as well as regular letter-space reads. VARiD combines both types of data in a single framework which allows for accurate predictions.
